original_text: Even if you beat a fool with a big stick, as hard as you beat grain, you will never remove all his silly ideas. Even if you beat a fool with a big stick, as hard as you beat grain,
korean_text: 미련한 자를 곡물과 함께 절구에 넣고 공이로 찧을지라도 그의 미련은 벗겨지지 아니하느니라

sentences.original_text: Even if you beat a fool with a big stick,
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 큰 막대기로 어리석은 자를 때릴지라도,

sentences.original_text: as hard as you beat grain,
you will never remove all his silly ideas.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 어리석은 생각을 결코 없앨 수 없다.
